Index.Indexhead2: In less than five minutes and three languages
Index.Section1: Create your own description in a unique way
Index.Section2: CV Maker Plus on all platforms
Index.Section4: In three languages and free of charge

Aboutpage.body1: You may know what a CV is, but have you ever experienced creating a CV yourself? How long did it take?
Aboutpage.body2: When you submit your CV, one of the strongest points is the design of the CV because people's attention affects their decisions and we prepare your CV in a Professional way
Aboutpage.body3: Time is the most precious thing in each of our lives. We will prepare your CV in the shortest time, not only that, but also in three languages (Kurdish, Arabic, English).
Aboutpage.body4: Security guarantee because none of your data is visible to our admins and is completely secure
Aboutpage.title5: Contact us on Facebook if you have any problems

Contact.body1: Thank God for giving me this opportunity to make it easier for me and my friends to get a job and prepare their CVs that are easily organized according to our ability to work on our app to serve more users .
Contact.title2: I want to participate in the project
Contact.body2: You can help us by sending a donation to this number
Contact.title3: Have an idea and don't know how to do it?
Contact.body3: we have experience and experts in creating your website and mobile apps, so you do not hesitate to entrust your work to us to offer you a unique work that you deserve
